article_title: Q&A: Puget Sound salmon fishing closed
article_text:

og.description: SEATTLE (AP) — The state Department of Fish and Wildlife has closed recreational and non-tribal commercial salmon fishing in Puget Sound, after the state and tribes failed to come to an agreement over annual catch limits.
